title: 103_hr4817
content: Vegetable Oil Use Promotion Act - Establishes in the Commodity Credit Corporation the Vegetable Oil Industrial Products Fund to promote industrial products containing vegetable oils from specified oilseeds. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) make annual estimates of vegetable oil stocks. And (2) engage in activities, including purchases, to increase vegetable oil consumption and demand if stocks exceed certain limits.
